description:
The ACC Expert Center Brand Activation presents: The Brand Activation Summit - an evening program containing:

o  A keynote speaker: Stephane Scheyven (Contagious)

o  The best 2013 European Brand Activations campaigns awarded by the Integrated Marketing Communications Council

o  The Award Ceremony of the Belgian IMC Winners.

Start your evening with a visit of the Young Gallery: Across the Ravaged Land by Nick Brandt & get inspired by his Wildlife photographs

Our guest speaker, Stephane Scheyven (European Development Director at Contagious Communications London), will give a presentation on Evolution of media / Augmented Experiences: Contrary to many people’s expectations, new technology hasn’t killed off old media but rather the two have converged. Bringing in examples from around the world, Stephane will be looking at how technology is being used to extend the functionality of traditional media, to augment the experience of audiences, and to create new media spaces.

For the second part of the evening we’ll be presenting a selection of the top European cases from the IMC Award and finally we’ll reveal the 2013 Belgian winners.

This summit will inspire creative, accounts & strategic planners.

Book your seat now by transferring 65€ (BTW/TVA incl) on ACC-account[masked], with mention "Your Name  & The Brand Activation Summit".

More information on Contagious Magazine: the first global publication to look beyond conventional advertising and report exclusively on the techniques and innovations that are redefining marketing campaigns around the world. Contagious is a total communications resource for the global marketing community. As well as an information-rich magazine and DVD, Contagious also provides a unique online resource, weekly newsletter, events & consultancy service, in-depth media reports and bespoke intelligence 'Feeds' for advertisers and agencies.
name: The Brand Activation Summit
